p: None of the neem cosmetics displayed hemolytic effects on human red blood cells (HRBC) below 0.68 mg/ mL. Mild cytotoxic effect was observed in neem soap formulated with combined stem-bark and leaf SMs at > 0.69 mg/ mL. This may be attributed to the frail nature of HRBC since there has never been any report on human toxicity after using a decoction of A. indica leaves and stem-bark in tropical and subtropical countries.
